name: State | 02 Transformation
description:
Transformation explores the transitory period between seasons. It is the second song from the debut album, State. 

The work and animations featured in the State series represents the rebirth as an artist and is the culmination of five years of work. The album and animated series allowed a sense of liberation to create and make the Bases project what it is today. This work serves as the foundation. 

This is the second animation in the series and it has been exclusively minted here with 10 editions. 

Music by Darryl Kirchner 
Artwork and Animation by Darryl Kirchner
